item.title: Nazareth - Love Hurts
item.description:
Love hurts love scars
love wounds and marks
Any heart not tough
or strong enough
To take a lot of pain
take a lot of pain
Love is like a cloud
holds a lot of rain
Love hurts woo-
love hurts
I’m young I know
but even so
I know a thing or two
I learned from you
I really learned a lot
really learned a lot
Love is like a flame
it burns you
When it’s hot love
hurts woo- love hurts
Some fools think
of happiness
Blissfulness
togetherness
Some fools
fool themselves
I guess they’re not
foolin’ me
I know it isn’t true
I know it isn’t true
Love is just a lie
made to make you blue
Love hurts
woo- love hurts
Woo-
love hurts-

I know it isn’t true
I know it isn’t true
Love is just a lie
made to make you blue
Love hurts
woo- love hurts
Woo-
love hurts woo-

item.title: Nazareth - Dream On
item.description:
Dream on though it’s
hard to tell
Though you’re
fooling yourself
Dream on dream on
you can hide away
There is nothing
to say so dream on
Dream on though it’s
hard to tell
Though you’re
fooling yourself
Dream on
you can laugh at me
Because I’m crying
you can tell
Your friends how much
I begged you to stay
You can live
your fantasy
Without me
but you’ll never know
How much I needed you
dream on
It’s so easy for you
though I’m broken
In two dream on
dream on
You can never see
what you’re doing
To me so dream on
you can cross
Your heart
and still be lying
You can count
the reasons
Why you’ve thrown
it away
You can dream
your life away
Without me
but you’ll never know
How much
I needed you-

You can laugh at me
because I’m crying
You can tell
your friends how much
I begged you to stay
you can live
Your fantasy
without me
But you’ll never know
how much I needed you
Dream on
it’s so easy for you
Though I’m broken
in two dream on
Dream on
you can never see
What you’re doing
to me so dream on
Dream on though it’s
hard to tell
Though you’re
fooling yourself
Dream on
dream on-
